channel.title: Winterlove V3 Help?
channel.description:
ok, so i just downloaded Winterlove V3 Source to edit from here:
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/238877-winterlove-v3-original-wl-source.html
I extracted it and evrything, got the server running, and tried playing it on the silabsoft client. When i log in with a character that has already been created, I get on jus fine. But when I try logging in with a new character, I keep getting an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds Exception:21.
It says the problem is in the client, but I can't figure out what it is...If someone could try it out and maybe tell me what the issue is, that would be great :D

item.title: Winterlove V3 Help?
item.dc:creator: @redsox3334 redsox3334
item.description:
@redsox3334 wrote:

ok, so i just downloaded Winterlove V3 Source to edit from here:

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/238877-winterlove-v3-original-wl-source.html

I extracted it and evrything, got the server running, and tried playing it on the silabsoft client. When i log in with a character that has already been created, I get on jus fine. But when I try logging in with a new character, I keep getting an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds Exception:21.

It says the problem is in the client, but I can’t figure out what it is…If someone could try it out and maybe tell me what the issue is, that would be great
